Bash(git -C "D:/VS/DataAnalysis" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix incorrect test expectation for volume_m3 in capacity analysis

The test was expecting volume_m3 to be the total volume of units fitting
in a carrier \(0.02 mÂ³\), but volume_m3 actually stores the unit volume
\(0.0005 mÂ³\). Updated test to check the correct expected value.

Bash(powershell -Command "$content = @''
{
  ""permissions"": {
    ""allow"": [
      ""Bash\(mkdir:*\)"",
      ""Bash\(python:*\)"",
      ""Bash\(pip install:*\)"",
      ""Bash\(where:*\)"",
      ""Bash\(C:Python314python.exe -m pip install fastexcel\)"",
      ""Bash\(streamlit --version:*\)"",
      ""Bash\(git add:*\)"",
      ""Bash\(git commit:*\)"",
      ""Bash\(git push\)"",
      ""mcp__ide__getDiagnostics"",
      ""Bash\(dir:*\)"",
      ""Bash\(git show:*\)"",
      ""Bash\(cd:*\)"",
      ""Bash\(streamlit run:*\)""
    ],
    ""defaultMode"": ""default""
  },
  ""enabledPlugins"": {
    ""frontend-design@claude-plugins-official"": true,
    ""playwright@claude-plugins-official"": true
  }
}
''@; $content | Out-File -FilePath ''C:\\Users\\roszc\\.claude\\settings.json'' -Encoding utf8")

Bash(powershell -Command "Set-Content -Path ''C:\\Users\\roszc\\.claude\\settings.json'' -Value ''{""permissions"":{""allow"":[""Bash\(mkdir:*\)"",""Bash\(python:*\)"",""Bash\(pip install:*\)"",""Bash\(where:*\)"",""Bash\(C:Python314python.exe -m pip install fastexcel\)"",""Bash\(streamlit --version:*\)"",""Bash\(git add:*\)"",""Bash\(git commit:*\)"",""Bash\(git push\)"",""mcp__ide__getDiagnostics"",""Bash\(dir:*\)"",""Bash\(git show:*\)"",""Bash\(cd:*\)"",""Bash\(streamlit run:*\)""],""defaultMode"":""default""},""enabledPlugins"":{""frontend-design@claude-plugins-official"":true,""playwright@claude-plugins-official"":true}}''")
